results.idea: Momentum in analyst sentiment score
results.description: Uses snt1_cored1_score momentum. SUGGESTION1: single-field here for focus; SUGGESTION2: no vector fields in DATA so not applied; SUGGESTION3: coverage>0.6 so ts_backfill not needed; SUGGESTION4: high userCount/alphaCount (515/3640) supports stronger signal. Kept implementation short and within operator/datafield limits. Confidence set to 0.75 based on coverage and usage.

results.idea: Recent upgrade breadth vs buy recommendation ratio
results.description: Compare snt1_d1_netrecpercent momentum vs snt1_d1_buyrecpercent level. SUGGESTION1: used two fields; SUGGESTION2: none are vector; SUGGESTION3: both coverage<0.6 so ts_backfill applied; SUGGESTION4: selected fields with moderate user/alpha counts. Compares revision momentum to buy ratio. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Earnings revision surprise momentum
results.description: Capture rapid positive change in snt1_d1_earningsrevision. SUGGESTION1: single-field to capture purity; SUGGESTION3: coverage<0.6 so ts_backfill used; SUGGESTION4: moderate userCount. Short pipeline, confidence 0.6.

results.idea: High analyst coverage with rising buy recommendations
results.description: Pairs snt1_d1_analystcoverage (breadth) with snt1_d1_buyrecpercent (strength). SUGGESTION1 applied; SUGGESTION3: both <0.6 so ts_backfill used for both; SUGGESTION4: analystcoverage has high user/alpha counts, increasing confidence. Implementation kept concise. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Mean-reversion of sell recommendation spikes
results.description: Exploit temporary spikes in snt1_d1_sellrecpercent expecting reversion. SUGGESTION1 single-field; SUGGESTION3 backfilled; SUGGESTION4 moderate counts. Used ts_zscore to damp outliers. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Earnings surprise normalized
results.description: Use snt1_d1_earningssurprise standardized cross-sectionally. SUGGESTION1 single-field for clarity; SUGGESTION3 applied; SUGGESTION4 limited userCount lowers confidence. Short implementation with quantile/zscore. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Long-term EPS growth expectation breakout
results.description: Signal when snt1_d1_longtermepsgrowthest accelerates relative to its recent mean. SUGGESTION3 backfilled due to coverage<0.6; SUGGESTION4 moderate counts. Implementation uses ts_av_diff and zscore. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Dispersion among analysts as risk signal
results.description: High snt1_d1_dtstsespe indicates disagreement -> potential reversion/opportunity. SUGGESTION3 applied; SUGGESTION1 single-field; SUGGESTION4 moderate user/alpha. Use ts_zscore to normalize. Confidence 0.52.

results.idea: Buy when dynamic focus rank rises vs fundamental focus rank
results.description: Contrast snt1_d1_dynamicfocusrank (market attention) and snt1_d1_fundamentalfocusrank (fundamental signal). SUGGESTION1: used both fields; SUGGESTION3: backfilled both; SUGGESTION4: used fields with reasonable counts. Implementation computes difference and normalizes. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Net target percent divergence
results.description: Use snt1_d1_nettargetpercent momentum: unexpected upward revisions in targets. SUGGESTION3 backfilled; SUGGESTION1 single-field chosen; SUGGESTION4 moderate counts. Implementation uses ts_delta then zscore. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Stock rank breakout confirmation with analyst net recommendations
results.description: Combine snt1_d1_stockrank breakout with snt1_d1_netrecpercent confirmation. Both backfilled per SUGGESTION3. SUGGESTION1 used. Ranks and net recommendation zscored then multiplied to emphasize agreement. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Earnings torpedo (downward revision) short signal
results.description: Short when snt1_d1_earningstorpedo increases (estimates falling). SUGGESTION3 backfill applied; single-field per SUGGESTION1; used ts_zscore for robustness. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: Rapid change in up-target percent as momentum
results.description: Track ts_delta of snt1_d1_uptargetpercent to capture sudden optimism. SUGGESTION3 backfilled; single-field approach; SUGGESTION4 moderate counts. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Analyst coverage increase with low dispersion
results.description: Long when snt1_d1_analystcoverage rises while snt1_d1_dtstsespe falls (more coverage, less disagreement). Both backfilled per SUGGESTION3. Combined signal normalized. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Buy when buy recommendation percent rises faster than sell percent
results.description: Compare ts_delta of snt1_d1_buyrecpercent vs snt1_d1_sellrecpercent. Both backfilled (SUGGESTION3) and normalized. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.63.
